1 #include<ros/ros.h>
2 #include<opencv2/opencv.hpp>
3 #include<cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
4 #include<image_transport/image_transport.h>
5 #include<sstream>
6 
7 int main(int argc, char** argv)
8 {
9  ros::init(argc,argv, "image_publisher");
10  ros::NodeHandle nh;
11 
12 
13  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
14  image_transport::Publisher pub = it.advertise("image/from_cam",10);
15 
16  int video_source = 0;
17  if(argv[1] != NULL)
18  {
19  std::istringstream video_source_param(argv[1]);
20  if(!(video_source_param >> video_source)) return 1;
21  }
22 
23  cv::VideoCapture cap(video_source);
24  if(!cap.isOpened())
25  {
26  ROS_ERROR("ERROR:unable to open video device %d\n",video_source);
27  return 1;
28  }
29  bool w = cap.set(cv::CAP_PROP_FRAME_WIDTH,1280);
30  bool h = cap.set(cv::CAP_PROP_FRAME_HEIGHT,720);
31  if(!w || !h)
32  {
33  ROS_ERROR("WARNING: Resolution of 720p not supported\n");
34  }
35 
36 
37  cv::Mat frame;
38  sensor_msgs::ImagePtr msg;
39 
40  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
41  while(nh.ok())
42  {
43  cap.read(frame);
44  if(frame.empty())
45  {
46  ROS_ERROR("ERROR: blank frame grabbed\n");
47  continue;
48  }
49  msg = cv_bridge::CvImage(std_msgs::Header(), "bgr8", frame).toImageMsg();
50  pub.publish(msg);
51  cv::waitKey(1);
52 
53  ros::spinOnce; //unnecessary
54  loop_rate.sleep();
55  }
56 
57  return 0;
58 }
